query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Report on legal constraints for sourcing local and seasonal food across the EU
result.description: The analysis on legal constraints for sourcing local and seasonal food focuses on the legal constraints perceived by actors, different interpretations of the legislation across the EU and contradictions caused by the EU legislation aiming to simultaneously promote competition, ensure the food supply with reasonable prices for consumers and a fair standard of living for farmers. Also the fit with different sourcing structures and practices across the EU and the legislation is analysed.

result.title: Storytelling videos (42)
result.description: A total of 42 videos will be produced and published at the COCOREADO site and YouTube channel: - 2 professional videos (by the task leader): a video featuring the process of co-creation initiatives and other one featuring the role of the ambassadors (from the selection process to their deployment and through their experience at trainings). - 40 short videos (by ambassadors): ambassadors will be trained and requested to produce at least one video and upload it on the COCOREADO YouTube channel.

result.title: Report on IPR management, dissemination and communication activities (M12)
result.description: The scope of this document is to report on IPR issues development and dissemination activities performed during the first, second and third year of the project. IPR development will consider use of background and identification, protection and dissemination of foreground. The dissemination activities are reported in distinct categories and their impact to the project progress is analysed in a qualitative and quantitative way. A copy of the quarterly newsletters due during year 1 will be included in this deliverable.

result.description: This document describes the successful integration of the new products into the Silvisense service chain. It describes the verification that the processors and their input and output data files are integrated correctly into the service chain on all levels, such as archive, task scheduling and execution, web portal and WMS.

result.title: ACCEPT Performance Measurement & Verification methodology
result.description: The deliverable will define the proper Performance Measurement and Verification Methodology PMV for evaluation of ACCEPT solution with respect to demand response DR energy services and combination of energy and nonenergy services An accurate demand baseline forecasting shall be defined as well as a robust measurement verification process for implicit and explicit DR delivery Quantitative and qualitative Key Performance Indicators KPIs will be defined in order to assess demand flexibility elasticity as well as community engagement The approach will be based on proven methodologies while customizing aspects to fit ACCEPT innovation
